name: Eyevinn Technology
tagline: We are a Swedish based consultancy company with consultants sharing a passion for the technology that makes it possible to watch TV on Internet.
body:
We are a consultancy company based in Stockholm, Sweden, specialized in video streaming technology. As a team we have the combined knowledge on how to build a large scale video streaming service and our consultants are working with large broadcasters, TV operators, newspapers and other media companies in Sweden and the Nordics.

**This is our contribution back to the open source community.**

### Our Manifesto
Our manifesto is that whenever we have the possibility to release our code as open source we should. Source code under non-disclosure agreement and where the intellectual property belongs to our customers are of course not released here. We have recurring Hackdays where the team develop proof-of-concepts or tools that goes directly in here.

### Featured Content

- [docker-toolbelt](https://github.com/Eyevinn/docker-toolbelt) A Docker container filled with pre-built versions of video streaming related tools
- [html5-dash-player](https://github.com/Eyevinn/html5-dash-player) HTML5 player and analyzer for MPEG-DASH streams
- [html5-hls-player](https://github.com/Eyevinn/html5-hls-player) HTML5 player and analyzer for HLS streams
- [codem-client](https://github.com/Eyevinn/codem-client) Watch-folder based ABR-transcoding based on FFMpeg

### Contribution
We encourage you to fork our projects and contribute with pull requests, feedback or new ideas.

### Contact Us
You can contact us by email <info@eyevinn.se>, Twitter ([@InfoEyevinn](https://twitter.com/InfoEyevinn)) or here on Github!
Our website: http://www.eyevinntechnology.se
Address: Vasagatan 52, 111 20 Stockholm, Sweden

### Author
Main author of this page is Jonas Birm√© (@birme)
